Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support from credible sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Nigeria spent 1 billion naira on COVID-19 text messages based on a fabricated tweet.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the amount of money spent on COVID-19 text messages without proper verification.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the NCDC did not make the claim and it does not appear in their official communications.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the claim is based on misinformation spread by unreliable sources.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim understates any aspect.
